availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Michael Osborne (Mason County, Kentucky, day laborer)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, day laborer. Native of Ireland. Married to Bridget Henessy Osborne in Maysville, Mason County, on March 4, 1853. Father of John Osborne, Mary Osborne, Kate Osborne, Joana Osborne. Day laborer in Mason County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 3, p. 553.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mason County Marriages, 1851-1864, Film #000281844, p. 277.
